# Morfix

> Component

## Import

```js copy
import { Morfix } from 'morfix';
```

This is main component. All fields should be inside this component.

## Example

```jsx live
<Morfix initialValues={{ hello: 'asdf' }}>
     <div></div>
</Morfix>
```

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ------- | ----------- |

| onSubmit | SubmitAction&lt;Values&gt; |  |
